prompt: A majestic starship gliding through the cosmos, its hull a blend of futuristic technology and ancient celestial runes. Bright, ethereal visuals with shimmering starlight reflecting off the sleek, intricate design of the ship. Surrounding it are cosmic elements like a glowing nebula and distant stars, creating a breathtaking backdrop. Detailed depictions of the starship's energy trails and illuminating cores give it a rare and otherworldly aura, invoking a sense of awe and cosmic wonder.
